about_the_game:
About the Game:

“Hentai Room: Deep Galactic Penetration” is a futuristic journey filled with untamed passion, dirty fantasies, and unrestrained pleasure. On a research station high above the ground, five incredibly alluring scientists conduct their wildest experiments — not for science, but for their own satisfaction.

Uncover their secrets, dive into their world, and experience a project where boundaries don’t exist, and every desire is fulfilled.

Key Features:

Unique Storyline
Discover the lives of five extraordinary scientists, each with her own unique specialization and personality. From a strict leader to a provocative psychologist — every character has something unique to offer.

Intense Erotic Scenes:

Step into a world of unbridled passion where the only limits are those you set yourself. The sensual scientists await your command — position their legs and arms however you like, bringing your wildest fantasies to life.

Watch as their hips move in perfect rhythm with your actions, their bodies responding with unparalleled intensity. Every scene is a true explosion of pleasure — the girls can even get messy with semen, adding an extra layer of authenticity and spice.

Use advanced toys and devices to take their pleasure to new heights. You’re in control of every detail, turning each moment into a refined game where desires become reality.

Customization Options
Choose from three unique skin styles for the characters:

  • Natural Skin – a classic, sensual look.

  • Tattooed Skin – bold and artistic body art.

  • Galactic Skin – cosmic, neon patterns that perfectly complement the futuristic aesthetic.

Explore the Station:

  • Hentai Room: Pick your favorite girl and indulge in intimate moments. You can also listen to detailed profiles about each scientist, learning more about their lives and personalities.

  • Creatures Room: Join thrilling experiments with three unique creatures: Behemoth, Tentacle, and Flying Creature. Watch them have their way with the girls while you join the action using a dildo. Adjust their positions and move their hips to enhance the intensity and make every moment unforgettable.

  • Gravity Room: In this extraordinary setting, the girls float weightlessly in zero gravity. This unique environment opens up entirely new ways to interact intimately and take pleasure to another level.

Meet the Scientists:

  • Dr. Ania (Leader): A commanding perfectionist who thrives on control, even in moments of intimacy.

  • Mei-Lin (Psychologist): A skilled manipulator who knows how to provoke and explore the darkest desires.

  • Sakura (Biologist): Fascinated by grotesque beauty, she experiments with the surreal and the bizarre.

  • Yumi (Engineer): Designs cutting-edge devices and toys that take pleasure to new heights.

  • Hana (Behaviorist): Observes others’ reactions but increasingly becomes part of the experiments herself.

Warning:

This game is for adults only (18+) and contains realistic erotic scenes, nudity, and an exploration of human desires in a futuristic setting.

Dare to step into the Hentai Room, where pleasure knows no bounds. Don’t wait any longer — dive into this unforgettable adventure and let your deepest desires become reality!
